title: Did A Demonic Attachment Destroy A Family? | True Ghost Stories
description:
Today on a chilling episode of Real Ghost Stories Online. 

After touring a historic haunted location, a woman begins to feel un-easy about the energy in the room.

Could there be something dark, or even evil, lurking, and waiting for a living soul to notice? 

An even bigger question comes to this woman in the months after this encounter, as a string of unfortunate deaths and events seem to put a dark shadow over her life. 

Could these events have been caused by whatever was hiding in that haunted house? 

We discuss that story and more, today on Real Ghost Stories Online.

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!
